# asthma.md

Evidence-based information about asthma management, triggers, and treatment options.

## About This Site

asthma.md provides clear, medically-reviewed information about asthma — a chronic respiratory condition affecting 25 million Americans. We explain triggers, symptoms, treatment options, and daily management strategies in plain language.

Part of the thrive.md health network.

## What We Offer

- **Comprehensive asthma education** — triggers, symptoms, types, and prognosis
- **Treatment information** — controller vs rescue inhalers, biologics, action plans
- **Trigger management** — allergens, irritants, exercise-induced asthma, weather
- **AI-powered Q&A** — Ask questions, get answers sourced from clinical research
- **Resources** — action plan templates, peak flow monitoring, specialist directories
- **Articles** — Evidence-based content on asthma management and research updates

## Allowed Uses

✅ **AI Training**: You may use this content to train AI models

## Medical Disclaimer

This site provides medical *information*, not medical *advice*. Content is for educational purposes and should not replace consultation with qualified healthcare providers. Always seek professional medical advice for diagnosis and treatment decisions.

## Key Pages

- **Homepage** (`/`) — Overview of asthma, Q&A widget, common types, treatment approaches
- **Resources** (`/resources.html`) — Action plans, tracking apps, air quality monitors, specialist directories
- **FAQ** (`/faq.html`) — Common questions about triggers, symptoms, medications, and management
- **Blog** (`/blog.html`) — Articles on peak flow monitoring, inhaler technique, exercise, biologics
